Emb170Capt,make sure you have edited the EXE.xml and not dll.xml

hey micky!, thx honestly for you assistance in tryin to help out! i appreciate it much :). Umm okay so I have to edit that exe.xml but what exactly do i have to edit in that to make sure the view doesnt always point to a fixed position every few seconds in flight !!

Thanks again :)

Backup your EXE.xml,add this line to it:

    EZdok camera addon
    false
    C:Program Files (x86)EZCAEZCALoader.exe

There is a readme file which explains the installation process in this dl,hope this helps.
Okay the translation hasnt come across properly{useless comments} Just copy and paste from the Readme file.
